CustomField.description: Administrators select this optional boolean field to tell the system that the Set Contingent Percentage to 100% system property should fire for the specific Product Feature. By default, it is true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select this checkbox to tell the system that the Set Contingent Percentage to 100% system property should fire for the specific Product Feature.
CustomField.label: Set Contingent Percentage to 100%
